attributes.action: Stop The Torture, Send Suneet Jeerh, Grant Cameron and Karl Williams Home
attributes.additional_details:
Suneet Jeerh, Grant Cameron and Karl Williams have been subjected to severe torture while being in custody of the Dubai police since July 2012. Broken hands, electrocuted testicles, stripped naked and witnessing other distressful assaults while in prison.

We want to know why The United Arab Emirates embassy were forbidden from taken photographic evidence of the tortutre inflicted upon these British men by the Dubai Police, when they went to visit them to conduct reports.

Why won't they let us prove that these men have been tortured?
Why have the Dubai police kept them in custody since July 2012 without trial?
What kind of world do we live in where this kind of behavior is condoned?

Please sign the petition to make the government take this matter more seriously, and to keep our boys safe.
